```{r}
plot_df$year <- factor(plot_df$year, levels = c("2021","2025", "2030", "2035"))

# Create the plot
ggplot(plot_df, aes(x = year, y = Aluminum, fill = technology)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Aluminum", fill = "Technology") +
  theme_minimal()
```
